projects.name: Reddit Data Scraper
projects.description: Automated web scraping tool that collects post data from multiple subreddits, processes the information, and exports to CSV/JSON formats. Includes data analysis and top post identification.

projects.name: File Organization System
projects.description: Bulk file processing script that automatically organizes thousands of files by type, date, and custom criteria. Includes duplicate detection and batch renaming capabilities.

projects.name: System Monitoring Tool
projects.description: Linux system monitoring script that tracks resource usage, generates alerts, and creates detailed reports. Perfect for server maintenance and performance optimization.

services.name: Python Automation
services.description: Custom scripts for data processing, file management, and task automation. Quick turnaround, clean code.

services.name: Web Scraping
services.description: Extract data from websites automatically. Price monitoring, data collection, market research.

services.name: Linux Support
services.description: Server setup, maintenance, troubleshooting. Arch Linux specialist with years of experience.

services.name: Data Processing
services.description: Clean, organize, and analyze your data. CSV processing, report generation, data conversion.
